page.title: 03EVANGELINE'S TYPICAL DAY
page.content: On Tuesdays I get up and have a wash.I go downstairs and have my breakfast.I have Weatabix with milk and sugar.I go upstairs and get dressed and clean my teeth.I kiss mummy and daddy goodbye and go to school. At school we have assembly and then maths.At playtime I go out to play.After play we have English.We have dinner.I have egg,chips and potato.I go out to play.After dinner we have art.After last play we finish art.At quarter past three we go home. At half past four I go to music lessons.After this I have tea.I have stew,meat,potato,cabbage and cauliflower.Then I go to Theo's club. It starts at six and ends at seven.We play games, cook, have outings and make things.After Theo's I go to bed.
